function Scene2D_new ( max_entities   ) 

Allocate a new Scene2D.

Parameters:
max_entities Maximum number of entities which can be stored in the scene.
Returns:
Newly allocated scene.
function Scene2D_raycast ( from  ,
to  ,
type   
)

Perform a raycast.

Parameters:
from A vector2d indicating the start of the ray.
to A vector2d indicating the end of the ray.
type A typemask to filter the allowed hits.
Returns:
nil or the entity reference of the closest hit (Scene2DComponent). nil or the position of the raycast hit as a vector2d.
function Scene2D_reserve ( reference   ) 

Reserve an entity in the scene.

Parameters:

Reserved entity.
